title: Harvard Is Said to Be Open to Spending Up to $500 Million to Resolve Trump Dispute

title: Justice Department Scrutinizes George Mason Faculty’s Diversity Stance
summary: The Faculty Senate at George Mason University in Virginia adopted a resolution supporting the school’s president and his work related to diversity. The Justice Department says it will investigate.

title: Study May Undercut Idea That Cash Payments to Poor Families Help Child Development

title: Healthy Lifestyle Can Help People at Risk for Dementia, Study Finds
